page.title: 13EMPLOYMENT IN SEND
page.content: We conducted a survey on 500 parents of children in St Bedes school and found that about 20% of men work full time in the Send area, 35% work in London,and 10% work in the Guildford and Woking area. About 39% of women work part time in the Send area and about 10% in Guildford and Woking. About 30% of women do not work and 20% work full time divided equally between Guildford and Send. One local employer Ben Turner,repairs vehicles from local farms and industrial sites,and sells industrial machinery. The firm owned by Newship Ltd. employs 75 people. Newship Ltd. also own Clark and Spears,a whloesale nursery,employing about 30 people. Both these firms are soon to be situated on the same site. They sell plants to large stores such as Marks and Spencers and Tesco.
